product.longDescription: 1" globes on long, stiff stems are easy to harvest and use as cut flowers. Grass-like, silvery green foliage. Long vase life as a cut flower, and retains color as a dried flower. Tolerates heat. Craspedia is also known as drumsticks. Tender perennial in Zones 8-11. USDA Certified Organic. Ht. 24-30". Avg. 28,800 seeds/oz. Packet: 100 seeds.

Sun Ball Organic Craspedia Seed

Product ID:1771G.531771G

1" globes on long, stiff stems are easy to harvest and use as cut flowers. Grass-like, silvery green foliage. Long vase life as a cut flower, and retains color as a dried flower. Tolerates heat. Craspedia is also known as drumsticks. Tender perennial in Zones 8-11. USDA Certified Organic. Ht. 24-30". Avg. 28,800 seeds/oz. Packet: 100 seeds.
